page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: IN BARRY MOST OF THE HOUSING IS COTTAGES.MANY DATE BACK TO THE LATE 18TH CENTURY WHEN FLAX WAS GROWN AND PROCESSED.MORE UP TO DATE HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT IN CARNOUSTIE BUT STILL THERE ARE A LOT OF OLD COTTAGES.BETT HAVE BEEN BUILDING A NEW RANGE OF HOUSES ACROSS FROM THE SCHOOL. THE OLD COTTAGES IN BARRY HAVE FEWER ROOMS AND THE OUTER WALLS ARE BUILT WITH STONE AND MORTAR WITH SLATE ROOFS.MOST OF THE NEWER HOUSES ARE BUILT WITH TWO LAYERS OF BRICK AND A SEAL OF AIR IN BETWEEN FOR INSULATION AND TILED ROOFS. NOWADAYS HOUSES ARE BUILT MAINLY IN SCHEMES. THEY ARE BUILT CLOSE TOGETHER WITH SHOPS AND GRASSY AREAS.A WHILE AGO THEY WERE BUILT IN SMALLER COMMUNITIES.I THINK HUOSES ARE BETTER TODAY AND I HOPE THIS WILL CONTINUE.
